name: The Sand Man defends Sand Land from the Monkey Horde of Doom and some kind of CREEPY Lich guy
name_original: The Sand Man defends Sand Land from the Monkey Horde of Doom and some kind of CREEPY Lich guy
description: The is a game designed in 48 hours during a contest at the University of Michigan.  If you like it, purchase the windows version to have local 4 player co-op and be able to use joysticks!  It's a very crude interface but works.  There are no win conditions or lose conditions in the windows exe.  You collect bananas to "win".  If you die you need to restart the program.  Multiplayer allows raising fallen allies by standing next to them.  NOTE:  seems to be broken on itch.io, look at a working version here: http://jeaton.matero.net/assets/files/smslmh/webgl/
